quoteText: These companies – our vendors – are contractually bound to use personal information that we share with them only to perform the services we have hired them to provide. . Each company must agree to use reasonable security procedures and practices, appropriate to the nature of the information involved, in order to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

tosdr.case: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
